Popular! AIRLIE BEACH GLASS BOTTOM BOAT DAY TOURS SEE LOCAL CORAL REEFS AND MARINE LIFE ON OUR 70MIN GLASS BOTTOM BOAT TOUR OF AIRLIE BEACH & THE WHITSUNDAYS!
Popular!
AIRLIE BEACH GLASS BOTTOM BOAT DAY TOURS
SEE LOCAL CORAL REEFS AND MARINE LIFE ON OUR 70MIN GLASS BOTTOM BOAT TOUR OF AIRLIE BEACH & THE WHITSUNDAYS!
Quick Details Duration: 70 minutes Time: times subject to change with tides and weather. Availability: daily Ages: all ages Experience the Whitsundays on our Day Trips from Airlie Beach. Our 70-minute Airlie Beach glass bottom boat tour is perfectly designed for those who want to see the wonders of The Whitsundays Gateway to the Great Barrier Reef… without getting wet! Suitable for all ages (Infants 0-2 go FREE). This day trip in Airlie Beach cruises the coral reefs islands surrounding Shute Harbour; guaranteed to deliver breathtaking views of the underwater world and abundant marine life such as turtles, rays, and a kaleidoscope of colourful tropical fish & corals. Adult (Ages 14+) A$ 89 Children (Ages 3 -1 3) A$ 79 Family (2 Adults, 2 Children) A$ 269 Private Charter (1 - 37 Guests) A$ 2999 Infant (Ages 0 -2) Free Seniors Valid Seniors card required A$ 79 Discover local Coral Reefs & Marine Life on our Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat Tour in The Whitsundays Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat Tour Overview Join us on our unique Glass Bottom Boat Tour discovering Airlie Beach’s most spectacular coral reefs! This tour explores the valuable ecosystem that lives within the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef. Provides the perfect learning experience about the diverse ecosystems that make up The Great Barrier Reef. Get up close and personal with a colourful spectrum of vibrant hard & soft corals, fish & other marine life; all while you cruise through the idyllic islands of The Whitsundays. A WINDOW TO THE UNDERWATER WORLD Our Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat discovery tour allows you to immerse yourself in the spectacular underwater world, without getting wet! This tour is suited for all age groups; perfect for family, friends or solo travellers. Get up close and personal with a wide variety of marine life. Our shaded vessel ‘Bottoms Up’ is a custom made for coral reef viewing. Lions Lookout BONUS We are excited to announce we now feature a photo opportunity stop at Lions Lookout prior to Glass Bottom Boat Departure. Marvel at the views over the harbour and the stunning Whitsunday islands and add to your holiday photo collection! COURTESY TRANSFERS What’s Included? 70 Minute Guided Glass Bottom Boat Discovery Tour Funny and Informative Commentary About The Reef Courtesy Bus Fully Shaded Vessel All Safety Equipment Life Jackets For Minors Bonus photo stop at Lions Lookout We offer courtesy transfers from the following Big 4 adventure – 45mins before departure Club croc – 40 mins before departure Base – 30 mins before departure Airlie beach hotel bus stop – 30 mins before departure Club wyndham – 25 mins before departure Port of Airlie – 25 mins before departure Island gateway – 20 mins before departure Discovery park – 20 mins before departure Big 4 eco – 20 mins before departure Meet at Shute harbour marine terminal- 15 mins before departure Is the boat wheelchair friendly? Unfortunately, our vessel is not wheelchair accessible. There are stairs to get on and off the vessel and bus. Where do I meet you? If you are making your own way, please meet us at Shute Harbour Marine Terminal outside the café 15 minutes prior to departure. Alternatively, call us to arrange a courtesy bus pick up from our selected locations. Is this suitable for a family? This tour is suitable for all ages. Infants aged 0-2 travel for free. Can I bring my pram? Unfortunately, we do not have the space for prams on board the vessel. Are their toilets on board? Yes! We have 2 toilets on board our vessel.
=== TOUR END: AIRLIE BEACH GLASS BOTTOM BOAT DAY TOURS ===
